summary:
Mexico City is Mexico's capital and biggest city, and also the most populous city in North America. It's a major cultural and financial hub globally. Located in the Valley of Mexico, it sits at a high altitude of 2,240 meters. The city is divided into 16 areas called boroughs, which have their own neighborhoods.

With a population of over 21 million in its metropolitan area, it's the sixth largest city in the world. Economically, it's very important, producing a large part of Mexico's GDP. Historically, it was founded by the Mexica people in 1325 and later became the center of the Spanish colonial empire. Today, it has a progressive government and is officially known as Ciudad de MÃ©xico (CDMX).
title: Mexico City
